## Discussion

The web view automatically chooses whether pressing a link displays a preview of the destination for the link. By default, web views use the [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WebView-swift.struct/LinkPreviewBehavior/enabled] behavior.

# automatic

**Type Property**

The automatic behavior.

## Declaration

```swift
static let automatic: WebView.LinkPreviewBehavior
```

## Discussion

The web view automatically chooses whether pressing a link displays a preview of the destination for the link. By default, web views use the [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WebView-swift.struct/LinkPreviewBehavior/enabled] behavior.
title: automatic
